disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 14 March to end of Monday 14 March GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Lighter winds are forecast for Monday although there should still be enough air movement to disperse local emissions. With a 'clean' feed of air from the Atlantic throughout the day, little imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 15 March to end of Tuesday 15 March GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: A chilly start in places, then a dry day with light winds and some hazy sunshine. Feeling mild.<br/>The lighter winds should still be enough air movement to disperse local emissions. Little imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
